summary: This bill, the NTIA Policy and Cybersecurity Coordination Act, amends the National Telecommunications and Information Administration (NTIA) Organization Act. It establishes an Office of Policy Development and Cybersecurity within the NTIA, headed by an Associate Administrator. This office will focus on developing and analyzing national communications and information policy, particularly concerning the internet and communications technologies. It will also coordinate cybersecurity policy, promote innovation, and address barriers to technology commercialization.
